instructions.title: How To Delete Your Free Single Parents Meet Account
instructions.before: Deleting your Single Parents Meet Account is a simple process. Log onto your account from a computer browser and follow the steps below. This will permanently Delete your Single Parents Meet Account.

qnAnswers.question: What happens when I delete my free account?
qnAnswers.answer: All emails, photos, records relating to your profile will be immediately removed from the site.

qnAnswers.question: Does deleting my account cancel my paid subscription?
qnAnswers.answer: No.  You must Cancel Your Subscription first.  Once the Subscription account is deleted then you can continue to delete your free account.

qnAnswers.question: How do I know if I have a paid subscription or a free registered guest account?
qnAnswers.answer: You can check your account status page.  [Click here to do so] (https://www.singleparentmeet.com/v3/account/AccountHistory?back=MyAccount).

steps: [Log on to the Single Parents meet Website](http://singleparentsmeet.com).  If you're already logged in doing so will open your Single Parents Meet homepage.
Scroll Down and Click View Account Status
Click 'I have not found what I am looking for' and Click Continue
Type Deletion Request and Click Remove My Profile
Click Remove My Profile to Confirm
This is the Confirmation Screen you will be directed to once your account has been deleted.

instructions.title: How To Delete Your Single Parents Meet Subscription Account
instructions.before: Deleting your Single Parents Meet Subscription Account is Easy. Log onto your account from a computer browser and follow the steps below. When you cancel, your account will remain active with full member benefits until your current subscription expires.
instructions.after: Once the Subscription is Cancelled you will still have access to a free Single Parents Meet Account.  You must Delete the Free account to permanently Delete your Entire Account.

qnAnswers.question: What happens when I delete my free account?
qnAnswers.answer: All emails, photos, records relating to your profile will be immediately removed from the site.

qnAnswers.question: Does deleting my account cancel my paid subscription?
qnAnswers.answer: No.  You must Cancel Your Subscription first.  Once the Subscription account is deleted then you can continue to delete your free account.

qnAnswers.question: How do I know if I have a paid subscription or a free registered guest account?
qnAnswers.answer: You can check your account status page.  [Click here to do so] (https://www.singleparentmeet.com/v3/account/AccountHistory?back=MyAccount).

steps: [Log on to the Single Parents meet Website](http://singleparentsmeet.com).  If you're already logged in doing so will open your Single Parents Meet homepage.
Scroll Down and Click View Account Status
Here you will see your subscription status and transaction history.  You can cancel automatic renewal from this page.
